body:
Comment 1: 
The attached patch changes the problematic area to a paragraph.

This is less scannable, but to my eye, preformatted text set the list off as though it
might be all of the exceptions, which it is not. YMMV.

I hope copyright is not an issue for such a small patch, but if it is, just pretend you
wrote it.
Attachments: 1. go-1895-fmtDocFix.patch (762 bytes)
